quit:
Return to the main menu?
Your progress will be
saved.
clear_data:
Are you sure you want
to delete this save
file? You cannot undo
this!
hints: Use ARROW KEYS or WASD to walk.
Press SPACE, Z or J to jump.
Press Ctrl, X or K to attack.
Press Shift, C or L to shoot.

Press DOWN to crouch and then
SPACE, Z or J to high jump.

Hold down the ATTACK button
to CHARGE a power attack.

Hit bricks with your head
to break them.

Press DOWN + ATTACK after
jumping to do a down attack.

Hold down the SHOOT button
to CHARGE a power shot.
healthup:
It contains some sweet, sweet
vitality! It increases your
maximum health.
ammoup: You obtain a BOX OF BULLETS!

Now you can carry more bul-
lets. Somehow.
dreamorb:
It emits dreamlike energy. Who
knows what it does!

Lick the Eye? (I know

You pull a lever and suddenly
it feels like there are
fewer magical beams in
this area than before.
cutscene0:
She dreams of the future,
she dreams of the past,
she dreams of the things
that could have been.

A whole world exists in her
mind alone.

But now the dream is coming
to the end. And if that
happens...
cutscene1:
There was a time before
the Great Dreamer. Do you
understand what that
means?

It means that there is a
world beyond the World
of Dream. A real world,
if you will.

Or was. One can only wonder
what happened to it.
cutscene2:
There are people in the
Dream who came from
the world outside.

In the real world they
were rich and powerful,
the best of their kind.

So why did they decide
to live inside a dream
instead?
cutscene3:
The Great Dreamer used
to be a human. She also
came from the world
outside.

Lady Alexandra, they called
her. She had a gift of
dreaming, so they made
her a Great Dreamer.
npc0:
We are the keepers of
the Graveyard. Our
job is to bury dreams
that come here to die.

However, the Great
Dreamer told us to dig
you up and give you a
life. For what reason,
we do not know.

Nonetheless, there is a
portal east from here.
It will take you to
the World of Dream.

You can find some use-
ful items on your way
there. You can keep
them if you wish.
npc1:
This portal will take
you to the World of
Dream. It is a one-way
portal, though, so you
cannot come back.

Once you get there...
well, our friends
try to help you the
best they can.

Which is not much, to
be honest.
npc2:
Welcome to the World
of Dream! I'm glad you
made it here! You can
never trust the
graveyard people...

Your real adventure
begins here. You must
find the Great Dreamer
and do... whatever
you must.

If the dream comes to
the end, who knows
what happens?
npc3:
Did you know there is
also the Old Graveyard?
We bury the nightmares
there. Some of them
might even be dead.

Just pray you never
need to go there.
npc4:
In the old times we hid
Dream Orbs around the
island. They were
stored in chests like
the one above us.

If you could gather
eight of them, you
won a special audience
with the Great Dreamer
herself.

This was when the old
citizens were still
alive...
npc5:
The Great Dreamer is
unable to dream proper
houses, so she gave
us these..."containers"
instead.

This one used to belong
to the woodcutter, but
then he vanished, like
all the other old
citizens.

Now this house is inha-
bitated by the shop-
keeper.
npc6:
This part of the Dream
is now long forgotten,
hence we call it the
'Forgotten Coast'.

There used to be a port
here. New people tend
to arrive the main is-
land by ship.

However, people stopped
coming here centuries
ago. It makes you
wonder...
npc7:
There are many broken
portals in this island.
They used to connect
the Dream to the outer
worlds.

I think this particular
portal took you to
the Graveyard, or
perhaps the Entrance
Hall.
npc8:
The Great Dreamer loves
puzzles, so she created
us islands fulls of
puzzles so we could
'train our brains'.

This is the only island
that hasn't sunken yet.
She is not very good
at making islands...

You can reset the
puzzle by leaving and
re-entering this place.
item0:
It reminds you of your child-
hood. What a dummy you were!
item1:
It is a trusty (or was it
rusty?) old sword for all
types of unjustified
violence.
item2:
It is one of those novelty
firearms where you put
your hand inside. Not
very practical, though.
item3:
Its magical capabilities allow
you to breathe underwater,
making it possible to dive
without fear or dying.
item4:
You obtain a PAIR OF SPRING
BOOTS!

They are just ordinary leather
boots, but they have springs
in the bottom, allowing you
to perform a high jump!
Hooray!
item5:
This magical flames makes
possible to perform a power-
ful charge attack. Because
that's what magic fires
do.
item6:
Knowing that it this key only
opens red doors makes you
see red.
item7:
Not opening a blue door with
this key makes you feel blue.
item8:
It reminds you of the face of
your dying grandmother.
Better use it only to open
purple doors!
item9:
All this sudden negativity
gives you motivation to
learn a down attack.
item10:
You obtain a RECHARGABLE BAT-
TERY!

Now you can store some energy
plasma thing in your gun and
release it as a powerful
charge attack!
